title: How we exploited CodeRabbit: From simple PR to RCE and write access on 1M repos
author: spiridow
aiHeadline: How a simple PR turned into a full-blown exploit, giving hackers access to a million repos—because who needs security anyway?

title: "Remove mentions of XSLT from the html spec"
author: troupo
aiHeadline: The HTML spec is getting a makeover—bye-bye XSLT, hello simpler times! Or maybe just simpler lies?

title: Prime Number Grid
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: Tired of regular prime number grids? Here's a new one that'll make you question everything you know about math!

title: UK drops demand for backdoor into Apple encryption
author: iamdamian
aiHeadline: In a shocking twist, the UK government decides not to force Apple into creating a backdoor—could it be that they finally realized it's a terrible idea?

title: Custom telescope mount using harmonic drives and ESP32
author: waerhert
aiHeadline: Build your own telescope mount with some fancy drives and a microcontroller—because who needs a professional setup when you can DIY it with style?
